abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.description: Innate: Ornn increases  bonus armor by 10% and  bonus magic resistance by 10% from all sources.
descriptions: Innate: Ornn increases  bonus armor by 10% and  bonus magic resistance by 10% from all sources.

Innate - Living Forge: Ornn can purchase non-consumable items from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a Forge Menu with his recommended items to select to be forged.  Forging takes 4 seconds and the process is  interrupted if Ornn enters combat, disabling Living Forge.  Gold is only expended upon completing the forge.

Innate - Master Craftman: When Ornn reaches level 13, any upgradable (Masterwork) item Ornn owns or purchases for the rest of the game is upgraded for free, up to a maximum of two. Additionally, for each level after 13 (levels 14, 15, 16 and 17), Ornn can upgrade one of an allied champion's upgradable items (Masterwork) by getting within 600 range of them and clicking on them, up to a maximum of 1 per ally.
 Masterwork items: 
 Attack Damage Items:  Might of the Ruined King,  Molten Edge,  Obsidian Cleaver,  Trinity Fusion,  Youmuu's Wraithblade.
 Ability Power Items:  Luden's Pulse,  Rabadon's Deathcrown,  Zhonya's Paradox.
 Tank Items:  Forgefire Cape,  Frozen Fist,  Infernal Mask.
 Support Items:  Circlet of the Iron Solari,  Salvation.
Innate - Temper: Ornn's basic attacks against  Brittle enemies briefly  knocks them back.
Enemies made  Brittle by Ornn take 10% − 18% (based on Ornn's level) of their maximum health as bonus magic damage the next time they are  immobilized by Ornn or his allies, consuming Brittle.

abilities.name: Volcanic Rupture
abilities.description: Active:  Ornn slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.
descriptions: Active:  Ornn slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.
After a 1.125-second delay, a magma pillar erupts at maximum range,  knocking aside enemies hit and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
The pillar will not expire while Ornn is  charging.

abilities.name: Bellows Breath
abilities.description: Active: Ornn marches with  displacement immunity in the target direction with 35% reduced  movement speed for 0.75 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Total Magic Damage:»12 / 13 / 14 / 15 / 16% of target's maximum health«Damage Per Instance:2.4 / 2.6 / 2.8 / 3 / 3.2% of target's maximum health
levelings: Total Magic Damage:»12 / 13 / 14 / 15 / 16% of target's maximum health«Damage Per Instance:2.4 / 2.6 / 2.8 / 3 / 3.2% of target's maximum health

Total Minimum/Minion Damage:»80 / 130 / 180 / 230 / 280«Minimum/Minion Damage Per Instance:16 / 26 / 36 / 46 / 56
Total Monster Damage:»155 / 180 / 205 / 230 / 255«Monster Damage Per Instance:31 / 36 / 41 / 46 / 51
descriptions: Active: Ornn marches with  displacement immunity in the target direction with 35% reduced  movement speed for 0.75 seconds.
Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage every 0.15 seconds to enemies hit. The final bout of flame will apply  Brittle for 3 seconds.
Bellows Breath has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to  minions.  Monsters take modified damage as well.

abilities.name: Searing Charge
abilities.description: Active: Ornn  charges in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.
abilities.leveling: Physical Damage:80 / 125 / 170 / 215 / 260 (+ 40% bonus armor) (+ 40% bonus magic resistance)
levelings: Physical Damage:80 / 125 / 170 / 215 / 260 (+ 40% bonus armor) (+ 40% bonus magic resistance)
descriptions: Active: Ornn  charges in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.

If Ornn collides with terrain while charging he creates a shockwave that deals the same damage and  knocks up and  stuns enemies within for 1.25 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once by Searing Charge.
The shockwave destroys the pillar formed by  Volcanic Rupture and partially destroys terrain created by enemy  champions.

abilities.name: Call of the Forge God
abilities.description: Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, after which an elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for 3000 range at increasing speed, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The  slow scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, with a minimum of 10%.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage:»125 / 175 / 225 (+ 20% AP)«Total Magic Damage:250 / 350 / 450 (+ 40% AP)Maximum Slow:40 / 60 / 80%
levelings: Magic Damage:»125 / 175 / 225 (+ 20% AP)«Total Magic Damage:250 / 350 / 450 (+ 40% AP)Maximum Slow:40 / 60 / 80%
descriptions: Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, after which an elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for 3000 range at increasing speed, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The  slow scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, with a minimum of 10%.
Ornn can recast Call of the Forge God after a 1.25-second delay.

Recast: Ornn  dashes 300 units in the target direction (but not through terrain). If Ornn collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction dealing the same magic damage and empowering it to  knock up and  stun enemies hit for 1 second, reduced to 0.5 seconds after the first enemy  champion hit.
Each pass applies  Brittle to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once.

name: Ornn
title: The Fire below the Mountain
blurb: Ornn is the Freljordian spirit of forging and craftsmanship. He works in the solitude of a massive smithy, hammered out from the lava caverns beneath the volcano Hearth-Home. There he stokes bubbling cauldrons of molten rock to purify ores and fashion...
